info.instructions: Brainfreeze is a simple concept but a challenging game. When you begin, each tile in the grid cycles between different pictures. Each time you click on a tile, it will freeze, while a second click unfreezes it. Your goal is to freeze all of the tiles so that they make a single, coherent picture. You need to complete a picture before the time expires.
Remember, if you want a frozen tile to begin cycling again, start it again with another click
With each round, the pictures get more difficult. In round one, it is clear which pieces belong to which pictures, but in the later rounds, your may have a more difficult time figuring this out.
